resources.string: Please connect to Wi-Fi and try again
Protect your privacy from spy hidden\n camera lenses.
If you like Glint Finder, show us some\n love with a nice review: it really helps.
When you subscribe, you’ll gain instant\n unlimited access
Most bedroom have nightstands, right. So\n one of the best places to put a hidden

Most bedroom have nightstands, right. So one of the best places to put a hidden camera into would be a nightstand, behind some regular object, like a clock or radio. You could get a hidden camera already built into a clock and put it right on the nightstand.
Many people have TV\'s in bedrooms. So putting a tiny camera near the TV or on
Many people have TV\'s in bedrooms. So putting a tiny camera near the TV or on top of TV would be a good idea. Of course, the spy camera should be hidden and not look like a spy camera.
Some people have PC\'s in their bedrooms.One could simply replace the
Some people have PC\'s in their bedrooms.One could simply replace the regular speakers with new ones, which already have a spy camera installed and perform secret surveillance this way.
Placing a hidden camera in a book shelf might be a good idea. Especially when the
Placing a hidden camera in a book shelf might be a good idea. Especially when the hidden camera is in a shape of the book.
Another place could be a curtain-rod. If you can get a tiny spy camera, which is barely

Another place could be a curtain-rod. If you can get a tiny spy camera, which is barely seen from a 10 feet distance, you could mount it on the top of the curtain or curtain-rod. You could get much better viewing angle and record everything without much trouble.
You could take one light bulb or lamp out and put a spy camera inside. Then put the
You could take one light bulb or lamp out and put a spy camera inside. Then put the light back and start surveillance. Just make sure than someone doesn\'t try to repair it.
You could put a small camera inside a flower pot and put it on a windowsill for
You could put a small camera inside a flower pot and put it on a windowsill for instance. If you have some flowers in the living room or plants, this won\'t look odd.
Tiny cameras could be placed into light switches. Some light switches have covers
Tiny cameras could be placed into light switches. Some light switches have covers, which help mask the spy camera\'s lenses.
Remember to find hidden cameras in the mirrors in the toilet, changing or trial

Remember to find hidden cameras in the mirrors in the toilet, changing or trial rooms, etc. As you may know, some awful guys would install a hidden spy camera on the other side of a mirror that is see-through, while the other side looks the same as a normal mirror.
We need Read Permission to scan
